data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Hazaribagh, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hazaribagh, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Hazaribagh, Jharkhand, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Hazaribagh, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,734,500 souls in Hazaribagh and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Angarok people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Angarok people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Angarok people is yours.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Hazaribagh, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Hazaribagh, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,715,420 lost in Hazaribagh that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Hazaribagh
